name: Datey Cicada: The Ship Show
description:
Ehhh idk what the cover image is, Rogue just sent it to me and told me to use it.

Anyways! You and three friends attend Reelin' U. What shenanigans will you get into?

This is a present from us to you, Shady Cicada, Happy Mango Soap day!

Also there might be some issues with the history system but we hope you enjoy it regardless.

(Scroll down to download)
